channel.title: How to make it so you can't run?
channel.description: I was wondering if it was possible to make it so you can only walk if you're in certain coordinates. If anyone could guide me in the right direction for doing this I'd appreciate it.

item.title: How to make it so you can't run?

try this example…

if (absY => 3333 && absX <= 3444){ ---------The run code---------}else{ --------run code disabled------- this is just my thought i dont know if it will work…
